mapper.select: SELECT cl.cid, cl.cname, cl.region, du.cname AS uname, du.phone, cs.systemname, ci.address, to_char(to_timestamp(cl.regtime / 1000), 'yyyy-MM-dd') as jointime, cf.status FROM tb_company_list cl right join tb_company_friend cf on cf.cid = cl.cid LEFT JOIN tb_dept_user du ON du.cid = cl.cid AND du.uid = cl.manager LEFT join tb_company_sysconfig cs on cs.cid = cl.cid left join tb_company_info ci on ci.cid = cl.cid WHERE (du.cname LIKE '%${value}%' OR cl.cname LIKE '%${value}%') order by cl.id LIMIT #{pagesize} OFFSET #{start}

SELECT count(1) FROM tb_company_list cl right join tb_company_friend cf on cf.cid = cl.cid LEFT JOIN tb_dept_user du ON du.cid = cl.cid AND du.uid = cl.manager LEFT join tb_company_sysconfig cs on cs.cid = cl.cid left join tb_company_info ci on ci.cid = cl.cid WHERE (du.cname LIKE '%%' OR cl.cname LIKE '%%');
